solution.text:
Area of Quadrilateral = Area of Triangle (1) + Area of Triangle (2)
\(= \frac 12 \times h_ 1 \times d + \frac 12 \times h_ 2 \times d\)
\(= (\frac 12 \times _{j}_ \times _{{4*j}}_) + (\frac 12 \times _{{2*j}}_ \times _{{4*j}}_)\)
=\(_{{ (Decimal('0.5')*j*(4*j)) + (Decimal('0.5')*(2*j)*(4*j)) }}_ cm^2\)
